title: How to Make a Powdered Sports Drink Mix

steps.headline: Add all the ingredients to a small bowl.
Pour the drink mix into an airtight container.
Add the mix ingredients to a 20-ounce bottle.
Seal bottle and shake to mix.

text: Mix Add all the ingredients to a small bowl. Mix to combine. Pour the drink mix into an airtight container. Seal. Drink Add the mix ingredients to a 20-ounce bottle.  Add water.  Seal bottle and shake to mix.
